mapper.sql: ham_comment_qty as hamCommentQty , ham_busi_status as hamBusiStatus , ham_busi_summary as hamBusiSummary , ham_pic as hamPic , ham_join_qty as hamJoinQty , update_time as updateTime , update_by as updateBy , ham_org_name as hamOrgName , ham_default_pic as hamDefaultPic , cw_activity_msg_id as cwActivityMsgId , ham_busi_addr as hamBusiAddr , create_time as createTime , ham_org as hamOrg , ham_type as hamType , ham_sponsor as hamSponsor , ham_rcv_love_qty as hamRcvLoveQty , ham_by_type as hamByType , ham_busi_start_place as hamBusiStartPlace , ham_busi_type as hamBusiType , ham_enroll_end_datetime as hamEnrollEndDatetime , ham_busi_detail_msg as hamBusiDetailMsg , ham_by_pic as hamByPic , ham_contact_phone as hamContactPhone , ham_life_status as hamLifeStatus , ham_enroll_start_datetime as hamEnrollStartDatetime , ham_by as hamBy , ham_busi_end_place as hamBusiEndPlace , create_by as createBy , ham_rcv_goods_qty as hamRcvGoodsQty , ham_collection_qty as hamCollectionQty , ham_by_name as hamByName
mapper.insert:
insert into cw_hold_activity_msg( ham_comment_qty ,
ham_busi_status ,
ham_busi_summary ,
ham_pic ,
ham_join_qty ,
update_time ,
update_by ,
ham_org_name ,
ham_default_pic ,
cw_activity_msg_id ,
ham_busi_addr ,
create_time ,
ham_org ,
ham_type ,
ham_sponsor ,
ham_rcv_love_qty ,
ham_by_type ,
ham_busi_start_place ,
ham_busi_type ,
ham_enroll_end_datetime ,
ham_busi_detail_msg ,
ham_by_pic ,
ham_contact_phone ,
ham_life_status ,
ham_enroll_start_datetime ,
ham_by ,
ham_busi_end_place ,
create_by ,
ham_rcv_goods_qty ,
ham_collection_qty ,
ham_by_name
) values ( #{hamCommentQty } , #{hamBusiStatus } , #{hamBusiSummary } , #{hamPic } , #{hamJoinQty } , #{updateTime } , #{updateBy } , #{hamOrgName } , #{hamDefaultPic } , #{cwActivityMsgId } , #{hamBusiAddr } , #{createTime } , #{hamOrg } , #{hamType } , #{hamSponsor } , #{hamRcvLoveQty } , #{hamByType } , #{hamBusiStartPlace } , #{hamBusiType } , #{hamEnrollEndDatetime } , #{hamBusiDetailMsg } , #{hamByPic } , #{hamContactPhone } , #{hamLifeStatus } , #{hamEnrollStartDatetime } , #{hamBy } , #{hamBusiEndPlace } , #{createBy } , #{hamRcvGoodsQty } , #{hamCollectionQty } , #{hamByName } )
